snippet.title: The Heroes Around Me - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The Heroes Around Me on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1768470/The_Heroes_Around_Me



The Heroes Around Me is a short story about the old days, in which the father shouldered the burden of the family and gave his sick daughter the most happy childhood, as well as the trivial life matters, goals and pursuits of the neighbors and friends hidden in the streets and lanes.


Source: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vrskoPO-6pw


#trailer #gametrailers #games #gaming
